node.excerpt: 리액트(React), 누구세요? 공식홈페이지의 정의를 보자. A JavaScript library for building user interfaces Declarative React makes it painless to create interactive UIs. Design simple views for each state in your application, and React will efficiently update and render just the right components when your data changes. Component-Based Build encapsulated components that manage their own state, then compose them to make complex UIs. Learn Once, Write Anywhere We don’t make assumptions about the rest of your technology …
